Przyjemna gra, zwłaszcza gdy gra się ją z kolegami. Jeżeli oczekujecie wyższej jakości grafiki to polecam część drugą serii, aczkolwiek w L4D jest, moim zdaniem, dużo lepszy klimat. (Polecam kupić puki promocja trwa - pakiet dwóch gier za 10zł)
eee fajnie sie strzela do zombie..... i..... polecam dzieciom :)

当年第一次玩的时候提心吊胆中途放弃，十几年后再次尝试毫无波澜降维打击。
看起来港片说的没错，年级的增加对鬼片的抗性也就越强。
Even if L4D2 already has all of the maps from this game, it's still nice to pay a visit to the original.

[b] 4 out of 5. [/b]

It's a good game. I remember playing it back on the Xbox 360, but I never played multiplayer since I didn't know “Xbox Live” (or “Xbox Gold”) was a thing until 2018. 

I'm now playing it on PC, which is better. I recommend playing with friends if you have any. 

Watch out for trolls, especially the ones that teamkill. They're annoying, but you can shit on them if your aim is good. 

You can run this game at 1080p stable 60 frames with real players on an Intel UHD 620.

Don't buy this. Left 4 Dead 2 is a direct upgrade. Once you have the sequel there is no reason to touch this since the sequel has all the same stuff as the first one and more.

Buy this instead:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/550/Left_4_Dead_2/

Si DonSebastianLIVE tiene un millón de fans, entonces yo soy uno de ellos. Si DonSebastianLIVE tiene diez fans, yo soy uno de ellos. Si DonSebastianLIVE solo tiene un fan, ese soy yo. Si DonSebastianLIVE no tiene fans, significa que ya no estoy en la tierra. Si el mundo esta en contra de DonSebastianLIVE, entonces yo estoy en contra del mundo.
Even though it is laggy at times, it is a very fun game to play! I meant to buy l4d2 instead of this one, but it's still fun!
muy bueno el juego. me encanta.

I must say, for the first game in the franchise, (at least that i know of) this is a really good game, even if it hasn't aged the best (at least compared to most modern games now). This game has a decent variety of weapons, memorable characters, and can even be challenging at times. I've beaten the first 3 campaigns and they were definitely worth playing. I'd give this game a 9/10. It's not L4D2, but dang this is still a good game to play. I would definitely recommend playing it. :D

Um jogo capaz de atrair novas gerações de jogadores a cada ano. Left 4 Dead é um dos melhores jogos de todos os tempos. Com uma jogabilidade marcante, um ótimo multiplayer, além de certas cenas que fazem a gente morrer de rir (cair do prédio em Sem Misericórdia kkkk). L4D continua sendo inspiração para vários jogos do gênero.

Британские учёные гласят: подавляющее большинство пользователей Steam не смотрят на отзывы и покупают игры по своим внутренним убеждениям.
Чтобы поставить игре положительную рекомендацию, нужно оставить отзыв. Я не гений в написании обзоров и своих ощущений, поэтому просто напишу, что я гей.

My boyfriend introduced this to me with his xbox 360, I had so much fun playing it then and still do. It's worth replaying - unless you replay it WAY too much and experience burn out - there are so many chances to get achievements, and is overall a fun shoot em up. L4d2, Back for Blood, and World War Z have been amazing to play with this in the back of my head as a sort of predecessor

O jogo traz uma ótima jogabilidade, gráficos bonitos que conseguem rodar em muitos PCs, além de ser bastante otimizado e possuir uma ótima campanha. Recomendo este jogo tendo consciência que ele é um dos melhores jogos no gênero dele.
